about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Daniel Wilczak, a Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions and building modern web applications.
about.experience: With years of experience in software development, I've worked on various projects ranging from web applications to mobile apps and AI solutions.
contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out through any of the following channels:
web.title: Web Development Projects
web.modernDesc: Specializing in building responsive, performant web applications using modern technologies and best practices.
mobile.title: Mobile Development Projects
mobile.iosAndroidDesc: Creating native and cross-platform mobile applications with a focus on user experience and performance.
ai.title: AI & Machine Learning Projects
ai.solutionsDesc: Developing intelligent solutions using cutting-edge AI and machine learning technologies to solve complex problems.
